short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the names of Republican presidential candidates with their proposed Secret Service code names.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
During the Sept. 16, 2015, Republican presidential debate, the candidates each stated what their preferred code names would be if they were elected. This extension replaces their actual names with their chosen code names. That's it. 

Read more here: http://fusion.net/story/199195/our-new-chrome-extension-lets-you-read-about-gop-candidates-with-their-desired-secret-service-codenames/
